original: Majjhima Nikāya 59
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Bahuvedanīyasutta
analyzed: bahuvedanīyasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho pañcakaṅgo thapati yenāyasmā udāyī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ
analyzed: atha khalu pañcakaṅgaḥ thapati yena āyasmai udāyī tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā

original: udāyiṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho pañcakaṅgo thapati āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: udāyim abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho pañcakaṅgaḥ thapatiḥ āyasmantam udāyim etat avoca

original: “kati nu kho, bhante udāyi, vedanā vuttā bhagavatā”ti?
analyzed: kati nu kho bhante udāyi vedanā vuttā bhagavatā ati

original: “Tisso kho, thapati, vedanā vuttā bhagavatā.
analyzed: tissaḥ kho thapati vedanā vuttā bhagavatā

original: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
analyzed: sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā adukkhamasukhā vedanā

original: imā kho, thapati, tisso vedanā vuttā bhagavatā”ti.
analyzed: imāḥ kho thapati tissaḥ vedanāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, pañcakaṅgo thapati āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte pañcakaṅgaḥ thapatiḥ āyasmantam udāyim etat avoca

original: “na kho, bhante udāyi, tisso vedanā vuttā bhagavatā;
analyzed: na kho bhante udāyi tissaḥ vedanāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā

original: dve vedanā vuttā bhagavatā—
analyzed: dve vedanāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā

original: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā.
analyzed: sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā

original: Yāyaṁ, bhante, adukkhamasukhā vedanā santasmiṁ esā paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā”ti.
analyzed: yāya bhante adukkhamasukhā vedanā santasmin esā paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā ati

original: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā udāyī pañcakaṅgaṁ thapatiṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho āyasmai udāyī pañcakaṅgam thapatim etat avoca

original: “na kho, gahapati, dve vedanā vuttā bhagavatā;
analyzed: na kho gahapati dve vedanā vuttā bhagavatā

original: tisso vedanā vuttā bhagavatā.
analyzed: tissaḥ vedanāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā

original: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
analyzed: sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā adukkhamasukhā vedanā

original: imā kho, thapati, tisso vedanā vuttā bhagavatā”ti.
analyzed: imāḥ kho thapati tissaḥ vedanāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā ati

original: Dutiyampi kho pañcakaṅgo thapati āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho pañcakaṅgaḥ thapatiḥ āyasmantam udāyim etat avoca

original: “na kho, bhante udāyi, tisso vedanā vuttā bhagavatā;
analyzed: na kho bhante udāyi tissaḥ vedanāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā

original: dve vedanā vuttā bhagavatā—
analyzed: dve vedanāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā

original: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā.
analyzed: sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā

original: Yāyaṁ, bhante, adukkhamasukhā vedanā santasmiṁ esā paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā”ti.
analyzed: yāya bhante adukkhamasukhā vedanā santasmin esā paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā ati

original: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā udāyī pañcakaṅgaṁ thapatiṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi khalu āyasmai udāyī pañcakaṅgam thapatim etat avoca

original: “na kho, thapati, dve vedanā vuttā bhagavatā;
analyzed: na kho thapati dve vedanā vuttā bhagavatā

original: tisso vedanā vuttā bhagavatā.
analyzed: tissaḥ vedanāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā

original: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
analyzed: sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā adukkhamasukhā vedanā

original: imā kho, thapati, tisso vedanā vuttā bhagavatā”ti.
analyzed: imāḥ kho thapati tissaḥ vedanāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā ati

original: Tatiyampi kho pañcakaṅgo thapati āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho pañcakaṅgaḥ thapatiḥ āyasmantam udāyim etat avoca

original: “na kho, bhante udāyi, tisso vedanā vuttā bhagavatā,
analyzed: na kho bhante udāyi tissaḥ vedanāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā

original: dve vedanā vuttā bhagavatā—
analyzed: dve vedanāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā

original: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā.
analyzed: sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā

original: Yāyaṁ, bhante, adukkhamasukhā vedanā santasmiṁ esā paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā”ti.
analyzed: yāya bhante adukkhamasukhā vedanā santasmin esā paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā ati

original: Neva kho sakkhi āyasmā udāyī pañcakaṅgaṁ thapatiṁ saññāpetuṁ, na panāsakkhi pañcakaṅgo thapati āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ saññāpetuṁ.
analyzed: na iva kho sakkhi āyasmantam udāyī pañcakaṅgam thapatim saññāpetu na pana asakkhi pañcakaṅgaḥ thapatiḥ āyasmantam udāyim saññāpetu

original: Assosi kho āyasmā ānando āyasmato udāyissa pañcakaṅgena thapatinā saddhiṁ imaṁ kathāsallāpaṁ.
analyzed: assosi kho āyasmā ānandaḥ āyasmataḥ udāyissa pañcakaṅgena thapatinā saddhim imam kathā sallāpa

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando yāvatako ahosi āyasmato udāyissa pañcakaṅgena thapatinā saddhiṁ kathāsallāpo taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavato ārocesi.
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho āyasmat ānandaḥ yāvatakaḥ ahosi āyasmataḥ udāyissa pañcakaṅgena thapatinā saddhim kathā sallāpaḥ tam sabbam bhagavataḥ ārocesi

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte bhagavān āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “santaññeva kho, ānanda, pariyāyaṁ pañcakaṅgo thapati udāyissa nābbhanumodi, santaññeva ca pana pariyāyaṁ udāyī pañcakaṅgassa thapatissa nābbhanumodi.
analyzed: santaññā iva kho ānanda pariyāyam pañcakaṅgaḥ thapati udāyissa na abbhanumodi santaññā iva ca pana pariyāyam udāyī pañcakaṅgassa thapatissa na abbhanumodi

original: Dvepānanda, vedanā vuttā mayā pariyāyena, tissopi vedanā vuttā mayā pariyāyena, pañcapi
analyzed: dvepa ānanda vedanā vuttā mayā pariyāyena tissaḥ api vedanāḥ vuttāḥ mayā pariyāyena pañca api

original: vedanā vuttā mayā pariyāyena, chapi vedanā vuttā mayā pariyāyena, aṭṭhārasapi vedanā
analyzed: vedanā vuttā mayā pariyāyena chapi vedanā vuttā mayā pariyāyena aṭṭhārasa pi vedanā

original: vuttā mayā pariyāyena, chattiṁsapi vedanā vuttā mayā pariyāyena, aṭṭhasatampi vedanā
analyzed: vuttā mayā pariyāyena chattisa api vedanā vuttā mayā pariyāyena aṭṭhasatam pi vedanā

original: vuttā mayā pariyāyena.
analyzed: vuttā mayā pariyāyena

original: Evaṁ pariyāyadesito kho, ānanda, mayā dhammo.
analyzed: evam pariyāya desitaḥ kho ānanda mayā dhammo

original: Evaṁ pariyāyadesite kho, ānanda, mayā dhamme ye aññamaññassa subhāsitaṁ sulapitaṁ
analyzed: evam pariyāya desite kho ānanda mayā dhamme ye añña maññassa su bhāsitam su lapita

original: na samanujānissanti na samanumaññissanti na samanumodissanti tesametaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—bhaṇḍanajātā
analyzed: na samanujānissanti na samanumaññissanti na samanumodissanti tesam etam pāṭikaṅkha bhaṇḍana jātā

original: kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṁ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharissanti.
analyzed: kalaha jātāḥ vivāda āpannāḥ aññam aññam mukha sattīhi vitudantāḥ viharissanti

original: Evaṁ pariyāyadesito kho, ānanda, mayā dhammo.
analyzed: evam pariyāya desitaḥ kho ānanda mayā dhammo

original: Evaṁ pariyāyadesite kho, ānanda, mayā dhamme ye aññamaññassa subhāsitaṁ sulapitaṁ
analyzed: evam pariyāya desite kho ānanda mayā dhamme ye añña maññassa su bhāsitam su lapita

original: samanujānissanti samanumaññissanti samanumodissanti tesametaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—samaggā
analyzed: samanujānissanti samanumaññissanti samanumodissanti tesam etam pāṭikaṅkha samaggā

original: sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṁ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharissanti.
analyzed: sammodamānāḥ a vivadamānā khīrodakībhūtāḥ aññam aññam piya cakkhūhi sampassantā viharissanti

original: Pañca kho ime, ānanda, kāmaguṇā.
analyzed: pañca kho ime ānanda kāma guṇāḥ

original: Katame pañca?
analyzed: katame pañca

original: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā,
analyzed: cakkhu viññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piya rūpā kāma upasahitā rajanīyā

original: sotaviññeyyā saddā …pe…
analyzed: sota viññeyyā saddāḥ pe

original: ghānaviññeyyā gandhā …pe…
analyzed: ghāna viññeyyāḥ gandhāḥ pe

original: jivhāviññeyyā rasā …pe…
analyzed: jivhā viññeyyāḥ rasāḥ pe

original: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā—
analyzed: kāya viññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piya rūpā kāma upasahitā rajanīyā

original: ime kho, ānanda, pañca kāmaguṇā.
analyzed: ime khalu ānanda pañca kāmaguṇā

original: Yaṁ kho, ānanda, ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ idaṁ vuccati kāmasukhaṁ.
analyzed: yam kho ānanda ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukham somanassam idam vuccati kāma sukha

original: Yo kho, ānanda, evaṁ vadeyya: ‘etaparamaṁ sattā sukhaṁ somanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedentī’ti, idamassa nānujānāmi.
analyzed: yaḥ kho ānanda evam vadeyya eta paramam sattā sukham somanassam paṭisavedenti iti idam assa na anujānāmi

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Atthānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
analyzed: attha ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
analyzed: katamat ca ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Idhānanda, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: idha ānanda bhikkhu vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi pe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Idaṁ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
analyzed: idam kho ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Yo kho, ānanda, evaṁ vadeyya: ‘etaparamaṁ sattā sukhaṁ somanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedentī’ti, idamassa nānujānāmi.
analyzed: yaḥ kho ānanda evam vadeyya eta paramam sattā sukham somanassam paṭisavedenti iti idam assa na anujānāmi

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Atthānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
analyzed: attha ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
analyzed: katamat ca ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Idhānanda, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: idha ānanda bhikkhu vitakka vicārānam vūpasamā pe dutiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Idaṁ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
analyzed: idam kho ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Yo kho, ānanda, evaṁ vadeyya …
analyzed: yaḥ khalu ānanda evam vadeyya

original: pe….
analyzed: pe

original: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
analyzed: katamat ca ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Idhānanda, bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: idha ānanda bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā pe tatiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Idaṁ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
analyzed: idam kho ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

analyzed: yaḥ khalu ānanda evam vadeyya

original: pe….
analyzed: pe

analyzed: katamat ca ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Idhānanda, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: idha ānanda bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā pe catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Idaṁ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
analyzed: idam kho ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Yo kho, ānanda, evaṁ vadeyya …
analyzed: yaḥ khalu ānanda evam vadeyya

original: pe….
analyzed: pe

original: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
analyzed: katamat ca ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Idhānanda, bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā, paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā, nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: idha ānanda bhikkhu sabbaso rūpa saññānam samatikkamā paṭigha saññānam atthaṅgamā nānatta saññānam amanasikārā anantaḥ ākāsaḥ ti ākāsānañcāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: Idaṁ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
analyzed: idam kho ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Yo kho, ānanda, evaṁ vadeyya …
analyzed: yaḥ khalu ānanda evam vadeyya

original: pe….
analyzed: pe

original: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
analyzed: katamat ca ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Idhānanda, bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: idha ānanda bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanam samatikkamma anantam viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: Idaṁ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
analyzed: idam kho ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Yo kho, ānanda, evaṁ vadeyya …
analyzed: yaḥ khalu ānanda evam vadeyya

original: pe….
analyzed: pe

original: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
analyzed: katamat ca ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Idhānanda, bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: idha ānanda bhikkhu sabbasas viññāṇañca āyatanam samatikkamma na atthi kiñci iti ākiñcaññāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: Idaṁ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.

analyzed: pe

analyzed: katamat ca ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

analyzed: idha ānanda bhikkhu sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanam samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam upasampajja viharati

analyzed: yaḥ kho ānanda evam vadeyya eta paramam sattā sukham somanassam paṭisavedenti iti idam assa na anujānāmi

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Atthānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
analyzed: attha ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
analyzed: katamat ca ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

analyzed: idha ānanda bhikkhu sabbasas nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam samatikkamma saññā vedayita nirodham upasampajja viharati

original: Idaṁ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṁ sukhaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
analyzed: idam kho ānanda etamhā sukhā aññam sukham abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ, ānanda, vijjati yaṁ aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṁ vadeyyuṁ:
analyzed: ṭhānam kho pana itas ānanda vijjati yam añña titthiyāḥ paribbājakāḥ evam vadeyyu

original: ‘saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samaṇo gotamo āha; tañca sukhasmiṁ paññapeti.
analyzed: saññā vedayita nirodham samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ āha tat ca sukhasmim paññapeti

original: Tayidaṁ kiṁsu, tayidaṁ kathaṁsū’ti?
analyzed: tayidam kisu tayidam kathasu iti

original: Evaṁvādino, ānanda, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evamassu vacanīyā:
analyzed: eva vādinaḥ ānanda añña titthiyāḥ paribbājakāḥ evam assu vacanīyāḥ

original: ‘na kho, āvuso, bhagavā sukhaṁyeva vedanaṁ sandhāya sukhasmiṁ paññapeti;
analyzed: na kho āvuso bhagavā sukhayā iva vedanam sandhāya sukhasmin paññapeti

original: api ca, āvuso, yattha yattha sukhaṁ upalabbhati yahiṁ yahiṁ taṁ taṁ tathāgato sukhasmiṁ paññapetī’”ti.
analyzed: api ca āvuso yattha yattha sukham upalabbhati yahim yahim tam tam tathāgataḥ sukhasmim paññapeti iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti

original: Bahuvedanīyasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ navamaṁ.
analyzed: bahuvedanīya suttam niṭṭhitam navama
